title: FS: (2) 1880's Merchant's Gargling Oil Trade Cards....$30
author: Kzoo

posts.post_title: FS: (2) 1880's Merchant's Gargling Oil Trade Cards....$30
posts.post_content:
For sale are these 2 1880's Merchants Gargling Oil advertising trade cards. Both cards have good color and images on the front, with remnants of scrap book removal on the back. One card has a small tear on the lower border and some staining at the top, while the other card has a small spot of paper loss near the top. 

$30 shipped for the pair. Payment via PayPal 'gift', or 3% extra for regular Paypal. PM me with questions or to purchase. Thanks............Matt
